content: Downloaded today from the official site/ Play store. When I click Send, it turns my phone camera on and there's a message saying : "Scan an Invoice, an Address, an LNURL-pay, a PSBT or a Channel backup." But there's no option to do anything. There's no option to provide an address or QR code so I can send the funds out. I've been trying for hours now to get this to work somehow. I'm actually trying to buy medicine I really need, so I've been rather stressed about this. I also found another person reporting the same issue in the Play store last week.Thanks

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Which wallet are you referring to?I hope you have not downloaded a scam app on Playstore. You can go to Electrum official site and download Electrum. Import your seed phrase and you should be able to spend your coins if provided that you have not use a fake wallet for it.On Electrum mobile, no field to input your address, just scan it and it will work.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Once you click send, and it opens the camera, scans the QR code of the address. If it's a valid one, it'll detect it and you can then choose the amount to send: -> Or alternatively and as you can see from the above screenshots, there's is a "Paste" button on the bottom, that allows you to paste an address if you already have it copied.
